title: Saul Bass does Star Wars
content:
I caught this on the Drawn! blog site:  
here's what the Star Wars (ep IV) titles might look like if they were done by Saul Bass:  
 [http://drawn.ca/2008/03/03/if-saul-bass-did-the-titles-for-star-wars/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824063444/http:/drawn.ca/2008/03/03/if-saul-bass-did-the-titles-for-star-wars/)

It's pretty funny.

Jason C
author: jasonc
